name: Fruity Jump
description:
Welcome to Fruity Jump!

We created this game in 7th grade hoping to show the world that anyone can create cool apps.

How to Play;
- Tap to Jump
- Tap twice to double Jump
- Avoid the obstacles
- Beat the Boss!

Credits;
- Programming : Gabriel Reed
- Graphics : Miguel Talamantez and Quincy Puffer
- Soundtrack : www.dl-sounds.com

* Designed and programmed at Magnolia Science Academy - San Diego (2016)
